moblastwords.message.last_words_1: Why are you doing this to me...
moblastwords.message.last_words_4: I was just trying to live peacefully...
moblastwords.message.last_words_5: Let's be friends in the next life...
moblastwords.message.last_words_6: Once again, you erased a life from this world
moblastwords.message.last_words_9: Your heart just grew a little colder...
moblastwords.message.last_words_10: Animal Rights Group has joined the game.
moblastwords.message.last_words_11: Next time, it could be you...
